scripts.db:generate: [ -f .env.local ] && export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | grep -v '^$' | xargs) || true; prisma generate && bun run scripts/fix-prisma-exports.ts
scripts.supabase:setup: [ -f .env.local ] && export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | grep -v '^$' | xargs) || true; bun run scripts/supabase/setup-test-data.ts
scripts.supabase:test-01: [ -f .env.local ] && export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | grep -v '^$' | xargs) || true; bun run scripts/supabase/test-01-upload-user-a.ts
scripts.supabase:test-02: [ -f .env.local ] && export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | grep -v '^$' | xargs) || true; bun run scripts/supabase/test-02-download-user-a.ts
scripts.supabase:test-03: [ -f .env.local ] && export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | grep -v '^$' | xargs) || true; bun run scripts/supabase/test-03-download-user-b-forbidden.ts
scripts.supabase:test-04: [ -f .env.local ] && export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | grep -v '^$' | xargs) || true; bun run scripts/supabase/test-04-invoice-rls-user-b.ts
scripts.supabase:test: bun run supabase:test-01 && bun run supabase:test-02 && bun run supabase:test-03 && bun run supabase:test-04
